import React from 'react'; import groom from '../images/sachin.JPG'; import bride from '../images/neelam.jpg'; import brideback from '../images/brideback.jpg'; const Invitation = () => { return (

Hello!

We invite you to be with us as we celebrate our new life together

Sachin Thakur

S/O Jagpal Thakur

D/O Dalip Mandhotra

Babita Mandhotra
); } export default Invitation;
